EmailTemplate.subject: Dinner is on us at Oshkosh! Sign up today for our Annual Customer Appreciation Event on July 23!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Dear Customer,
We are pleased to invite you to our Annual Customer Appreciation Event on July 23 at our Pavilion #292, where you can enjoy food and beverages with our team members and celebrate our 60th Anniversary, while learning about our experimental and certified aircraft solutions. Register today as our popular event is space-limited.
REGISTER HERE FOR AN EVENT TICKET <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_BK_Oshkosh.html]]>
Visit us in our Booth #292 at our BendixKing Pavilion in Oshkosh, WI, during EAA’s 50th AirVenture event July 22 – July 28 to learn more about AeroPoint and AeroNav products, discuss subscription plans for upgrades through our Total Avionics Plan (TAP) and help us celebrate our 60th Anniversary with exciting show discounts!
